duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and run watershed-specific hydrologic models using programming, scripting, and modeling skills.
Apply hydrologic models to machine learning, neural network applications, and physically based and climate-informed snow and runoff hydrology models.
Coordinate and analyze snow surveying and remotely sensed snowpack data.
Participate in field data collection including conducting snow surveys.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Hydrology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
